name: Jupitron Game Collection Vol.3 - Oldies!
description:
Cover art by Fede Nessi!

This bundle has what I've made mosty in my first year making games (list, gifs & video coming soon!).

Includes 24 games!

- Super-S
- Chronoboss
- Otherworld
- Hyper Solenoid
- Egobreaker
- Awake
- RetroVs
- ULTRA
- Freedom!
- Feed your Demons!
- Robot Karma Joe
- Universe
- Voodoo Machine
- Moondo
- Waveblazer
- Escape from the tentaclonians
- Mecharay
- Powerclash
- NichiNichi
- Hit the $ on the TV
- Tozy's Birthday
- Lucky Charm

I've met awesome people doing what I love and been invited to incredible places to show some stuff I did so thanks a lot to everyone that stood there for me, testing, giving feedback and for just standing by (they know who they are!).

Almost all my games are on Newgrounds so this is a simple compilation of those same games (and some bonuses).

Hope you enjoy!
